Address.university_name: Ecole nationale supérieure des Travaux publics (ENSTP)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1970 as Ecole Nationale de Technologie (ENAT). Acquired present title and status 1982
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: Oct to March; April to Sept
AdmissionRequirements: Baccalauréats scientifiques et techniques/Secondary school certificate (GCE Advanced Level)

Address.college_name: CEMAC School of Tourism and Hotel Management
Address.university_name: Ecole d’Hôtellerie et de tourisme de la CEMAC (EHT-CEMAC)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded as Ecole d’Hôtellerie et du Tourisme, 1987. CEMAC institution: Upgraded as EHT-CEMAC (Communauté Économique et Monétaire de l’Afrique Centrale).

Address.college_name: Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics
Address.university_name: Institut sous-régional de Statistique et d'Economie appliquée (ISSEA)

AdmissionRequirements: First and second cycles, Secondary school leaving certificate with scientific major (Baccalauréat scientifique); 3rd cycle, Licence
DEUG for cycle II, MSTA; Master for cycle III, DESSA

Address.college_name: National Advanced School of Post and Telecommunications
Address.university_name: Ecole nationale supérieure des Postes et Télécommunications (ENSPT)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1969 as Ecole Fédérale des Postes et Télécommunications. Acquired present status and title 1982.

Address.college_name: National Institute of Youth and Sport
Address.university_name: Institut national de la Jeunesse et des Sports (INJS)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1985 as University Centre of Buea. Acquired present status and title 1993.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate and competitive entrance examination
Bachelor's Degree or recognized equivalent for School of Translation and Interpretation

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1977 as Centre Universitaire. Previously part of the University of Yaoundé. Acquired present status and title 1993.
AdmissionRequirements: Competitive entrance examination following secondary school certificate (baccalauréat)

Divisions.College: Teacher Training in Technical Education - ENSET

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1977 as Centre Universitaire. Previously part of the University of Yaoundé. Acquired present status and title 1993.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (baccalauréat), or foreign equivalent at Advanced 'A' level

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1977 as Centre Universitaire, acquired present status and title 1993. A State Institution.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (baccalauréat), or foreign equivalent at Advanced ('A') level

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1962, replacing the Institut national d'Etudes supérieures, founded 1961. Acquired present status and title 1993. A State institution.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (baccalauréat) or foreign equivalent, and entrance examination (for Teacher Training, Medicine and Engineering)

FieldsOfStudy: Traditional and Complementary Medicine and Therapy

Address.university_name: Université de Yaoundé II – Université de Yaoundé II-Soa (UY II)

AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (baccalauréat) or foreign equivalent, and entrance examination
